profile.name: Jason Siegel
profile.headline: Managing Partner | Public Speaker | Chief Digital Officer | Creative Director | CMO at Bluetext ☏703-625-3560
profile.summary:
Jason Siegel is an accomplished agency executive. As Managing Partner, chief marketing officer, and head of the Bluetext creative and digital services group, Jason manages and directs development of a wide range of interactive services for Bluetext clients. He has an exceptional record for great client service with all facets of creative and digital services. Prior to founding Bluetext Jason was a Partner at Qorvis for 8 year. He joined Qorvis after his digital agency Internet Gravity was acquired by Qorvis. Siegel founded his own interactive agency, Internet Gravity, in 1998 grew the company’s clientele exponentially. He has produced, designed and built more than 1000 websites for a variety of businesses and was selected by Yahoo as the nation’s best college web designer of 1998 and was selected twice to the 40 Under 40 by Direct Marketing Association (ages 36 and 38).

Specialties: Business Development
Leadership and Management
Branding
Integrated Communications
Digital Strategy
Information Architecture
Demand Generation

given.text:
Jason was my Creative Director for over a year at Bluetext. When I interviewed for my position he said I would get the equivalent of an MBA in web design and he wasn’t lying. After my time at Bluetext I feel extremely confident in my web design skills and I owe my knowledge to our creative team led by Jason.
Jason values each member of his team and will always listen to new ideas or process improvements. He is constantly looking to improve and frequently asks his team for feedback during team meetings. His door is always open and he makes a point to advocate for his team’s needs.
I am lucky to have started my career in design under Jason’s leadership and I appreciate and value all of knowledge he has given me. See less

I have had the privilege of being both a client and close, personal colleague of Jason for more than eight years. In my more than 20 years of marketing leadership experience in both national advertising agencies and international professional services organizations, I have never come across an individual who possesses Jason’s tri-fecta combination of technical web knowledge, media and design talent, and the ability to speak to clients in any industry, at any level. Put simply, Jason Siegel is a professional powerhouse in today’s constantly-changing digital media world.

In the past six years, at two different national firms, Jason and his team have supported me and my teams through the scoping, build and launch of three different digital platforms complete with new brand launches, media buys, PR campaigns and full-scale SEO builds. In addition, Jason and Bluetext worked with me and an international consortium of firms, marketers and firm leaders on the rebranding and launch for an international association of accounting firms. Through all of these projects, Jason’s creative vision and ability to communicate the technical and media scope of work were beyond compare. Few, if any, digital marketing and media professionals have Jason’s ability to set a definitive project course that everyone understands and in the end exceeds expectations and is delivered on time and on budget.

Having hired and worked with many media agencies and PR professionals over the course of my career, it took me some time to analyze how it is that Jason and his team at Bluetext are so successful in consistently delivering beyond what they promise to clients. Eventually I figured it out; Jason approaches every client and every new project with two primary tools: his ears and his eyes. Where other agencies and media professionals lead with a laptop and PowerPoint presentation, Jason brings a keen ability to listen, observe and analyze. And not just on what a client and its leadership team see as needs today, but also what they must consider for the business two or three years in the future. See less

Its easy to understand why Jason is widely recognized as a leader in web design and creative communications. Working with Jason and his team directly - he demonstrated his ability to understand, execute and deliver against our strategic needs...

Jason possesses a portfolio of impressive leadership and interaction design skills that are uniquely his own. His balanced, thoughtful leadership never failed to help us through some very challenging projects. I am privileged to have worked with him, and witness and learn from his tactful approach towards business and interaction design. See less

I had the pleasure of working on numerous projects directed by Jason at Qorvis over the last few years. Always expanding on the concept, a fantastic resource from marketing campaigns to motion graphics, the wheels never stop turning. A brilliant idea man, whose conceptual and literal designs provide incredible fuel to any creative development team. It was my job to bring to life the ideas that Jason conceptualized and laid out and he was always wanting to push the envelope. Amazing client relationships, Jason's demeanor was always uplifting, he was great fun and I was ever eager to work on the next one of his concepts. One of the best design partners I have ever collaborated with, with no shortage of continuous creativity. See less

I worked closely with Jason for over two years on an array of digital campaigns. Jason was incredible - knowledgeable, creative, results-oriented and a great mentor. He was always able to create engaging user experiences by leveraging the latest digital tools. Moreover, he executes his campaigns with a solid underlying business case, a trait that makes him stand out! See less

The passion and creativity that Jason brings to his role and to clients is unrivaled. He has the ability to completely transform a client's perception of how digital and interactive strategies can benefit its organization - and then transforms that perception into reality with the solutions he and his team deliver. He is on top of the latest marketing and interactive trends and frequently demonstrates how Qorvis and its clients can move the bar and utilize new, emerging technologies and applications to achieve organizational successes. From non-profits and coalitions, to Fortune 500 companies and countries around the world, Jason knows how to bridge a client's business/mission objectives to ensure the solution delivers the required results. I have learned a lot from working along side of Jason and look forward to hearing about his continued successes! See less

As co-founder of Bluetext I have interviewed, hired, and collaborated with 100s of talented people.  Charlotte is a shining star in that pack of supreme talent.

Charlotte grew as a great designer in my time working with her.   Growing from a stable production support role to a great lead designer.  She took on design lead roles for leading organizations like E.Cohen and Veeder Root.

Besides being a solid design teammate.  Charlotte is a natural leader.  Charlotte took on leadership roles with our creative group supporting all resourcing and utilization activities.  Spanning weekly resourcing, daily standups, and strategically reviewing resourcing in both macro and micro views.

It was a pleasure working with Charlotte, and hope to work with her again someday.

Jason Siegel, Co-Founder
Chief Creative Officer, Chief Digital Officer, CMO
